features: TAKE MARSHALL SOUND WITH YOU, EVERYWHERE: Willen is the mighty portable speaker that is made to go everywhere with you
DESIGN THAT SHAKES OFF THE ELEMENTS: Willen comes with a top-of-class IP67 dust- and water-resistance rating so it’s always ready for the road
PLAYTIME THAT WON’T LET YOU DOWN: Ready to roll whenever you are with a hefty 15+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge
ATTACH WILLEN ANYWHERE WITH THE STRAP: The ultimate multi-purpose speaker with its flexible positioning and mounting strap
PAIR, PLAY AND BRING THE LOUD: The shortest distance between you and your music is Willen – just pair and play without any complicated set-up
CONNECT MORE SPEAKERS WITH STACK MODE: Stack Mode raises the stakes with a sound larger than Willen – combine multiple speakers and create a sound as big as your imagination
BUILT-IN MICROPHONE: Make sure your voice is heard with Willen’s built-in microphone. Answer and reject calls using the front-mounted control knob and enjoy some hands-free chat

A SUSTAINABLE APPROACH TO MUSIC: Willen is just as impressive when you go backstage. This speaker’s rugged build is 100% PVC-free and 60% of the plastic is post-consumer recycled from used electronics
Covered by the Zound Industries USA Inc. one-year Limited Warranty. Additional terms apply. See below for details
body.description: Willen is the mighty portable speaker that is made to go everywhere with you. Built with one 2’’ full range driver and two passive radiators, this speaker brings you the heavy Marshall sound you can’t live without. A top-of-class IP67 dust- and water-resistance rating means it’s always ready for the road. Willen brings together the iconic Marshall design with a ruggedness that dares you to push its limits. All this, plus its hefty 15+ hours of listening on a single charge and mounting strap mean that Willen is raring to go wherever you go.The shortest distance between you and your music is Willen – just pair and play without any complicated set-up. Get hands on with your music with the equaliser presets in the app and the multi-directional control knob on the unit. Answer, reject or end a call with a few simple clicks and the built-in microphone will make sure that no one misses a word. This compact powerhouse is the ultimate multi-tasker but your music is king. Willen comes with Stack Mode – just connect it to multiple other Willen speakers to amplify your sound with an immersive multi-speaker session. Power your music with Marshall signature sound every single time, even when the session isn’t planned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best hands down. Give it a chance to break in before judging the sound.
reviews.reviewText: I love this Bluetooth speaker. Aesthetically it's fantastic looking. Feels really well made and the battery lasts a long time (for me). The sound quality was all right when I first started using it, but to be honest I was a little bit disappointed what the sound. However, after a few weeks the speaker had broken in a little bit more and the sound became so much more rich and full and it has continued to. I love it everything about it. I live in a one bedroom apartment and this little speaker is enough to fill it with sound, I usually never have it above 75% volume. I will eventually get a second one for stereo sounds but I haven't actually really noticed very much, the speaker does a good job at filling out the room. If you're on the fence at all just buy it and give it a little while to break in. I am more than happy with mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The sound from this is very good. Everything is crisp and can hear every instrument. Very good personal speaker. Battery life lasts through my 12+ hour shift. Very portable. Feels very good in the hand. Only complaint would be the pairing you sometimes have to use the app to connect or I usually just turn it back off then on. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but got a punch
reviews.reviewText: Was debating for a while if I should get the speaker since I already own a larger Marshall speaker. So happy I finally got it! It's easier to carry for barbecues, park and so on. Sounds amazing and loud. Took me a while to figure out how to use the microphone during a call but I finally got it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars That Marshall sound!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! What a great speaker. This thing gets loud and has that Marshall sound profile you know and love. I was looking for something small to fit in my carry on for a trip to Hawaii and this fit the bill.First off, this thing is beautiful just to look at. The styling on it is very swanky. It’s looks just like a miniature version of a guitar amp so it looks great just sitting around in your home. I decided to download the Marshall Bluetooth app to test the different sound profiles. I fired it up and connected it to my iPhone. I was immediately greeted by nice clear tones with surprising low end from a speaker of this size. It’s amazing that that much sound can come from a speaker just a little larger than a deck of playing cards. It has a couple of settings. One that’s a little flat designed for vocals, one that boosts the highs and lows, and then the signature Marshall sound. That’s my favorite. It has just a fantastic sound profile that’s pleasing for all kinds of music. The speaker also has a built in strap that snaps over any backpack strap or belt for using while you’re on the move. It has a nice rubbery texture and seems to be very impact resistant.Overall, this is a fantastic speaker and if you’re looking for a smaller carry on speaker you won’t be disappointed with this one. There’s other very capable speakers for less money but they won’t sound this good. Spend the extra dough. You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sounding speaker
reviews.reviewText: Marshall speakers are my favorite.4 stars for the Willen.This wouldn't connect to the Marshall app,it's supposed to.I don't need an app for this anyway.Love that Marshall signature sound right out of the box,no need to adjust the Willen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The sound is unbelievable! If you are throwing a party and need a speaker, this is a must-have. The cheaper speakers are not worth it…unless you are using it for the shower

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful look and sound
reviews.reviewText: I’m really impressed with the bass in this little thing I can’t wait to get a few more and link them together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these as stocking stuffers for two of my pickiest recipients and they both loved them. They have a great design esthetic and sound just as good.
Met my expectations. Handy and loud

reviews.reviewTitle: Si lo que buscas es portabilidad, diseño y suficiente calidad en audio esto es para ti.
reviews.reviewText: Lo compré incidentalmente buscando una alternativa para mi nada ligero pero potente y jugoso JBL Charge 4 y déjenme decir que no decepciona. Un diseño de lo más bonito, suficientemente ligero, portable y resistente como para llevarlo por doquier cargando apenas 300g. Al principio el sonido es algo acartonado pero después de la primer sesión probando distintos géneros, volúmentes y todas sus ecualizaciones mejora la calidad considerablemente. De momento me ha dado unas 10-11 horas 85-90 % de volumen constante, podría esperar las 15+ hrs a menor volumen. Aún no he probado el strap pero parece lo suficientemente robusto como para soportar las travesías. Lo he encontrado en oferta y no pude resistirlo, una compra acertada. Si lo que buscas es un parlante de viaje bueno, bonito(quizá no tan barato) no busques más.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. this little speaker is smashing! small and very cute to look at. i got it to take to the caravan holiday for some music, my hubby used it more than me. i also wanted it for the garden rather than keep dragging the alexa outside. sound is good, if you get the app you can choose wether you want more base/voice or just normal. yeah it’s a little expensive but the quality is fantastic, and hopefully will last a lot of years.
Great design and sound is crisp and clear. I can strap it onto my bike.
Me encanntó, tiene buen tamaño, buen sonido, y físicamente se ve hermosa, recomiendo.0
